reviews.review: I enjoy this game. Match making needs to be fixed and we doo need the option to have our own key bindings as well as join public games with our friends. But as its still pretty early I'm not going to knock the game for it. It can be very suspensful and theres plenty of "Oh Fuck" moments to be had. If you like spoopy games this one is worth a try.

This game has only been out since June 14th. And I have spent over 18hrs playing it. It is June 15th.

General:
This game is super fun. Well worth the money. Keep in mind. You get items, perks, add-ons, and offerings. When you use an offering it is gone forever. When you use an item you keep it if you survive and it is not fully depleted. If you use an add-on you have to escape with the item you brought in. If you want to stock up on items. Start the match with northing and go in and look for a chest. Then get out of there. Finally, perks are things to help you every game. They never go away if you die. Like perks in COD or other games like it.

Pros:
- Intense
- Awesome leveling system
- Character Customization (more soon to come)
- Private Matches with friends
- Daily Challenges for extra points to lvl up
- Ability to prestige
- Ability to have up to 4 perks at once

Cons:
- Not enough customization on launch
- Games can get laggy
- Matchmaking mechanic is trash
- Sometimes when you when a game and should rank up it doesn't rank you up
- Wraith should move slower when cloaked.


Survivor Side:

- Loves your friends when they are good
- Wishes them death IRL when they suck
- Wraith is too OP
- Matchmaking is terrible because I always get the worst teammates
- Connection Issues
- Heartbeat is the reason I have anxiety IRL now

Killer Side:

- Hates the survivors when they are good
- Trapper and Hillbilly need buffs
- Matchmaking is terrible because I always play against best survivors
- Everyone is lagging when I try and hit them
- Cusses at people when you find them and they escape



Tips:
- If I see another survivor hide in a locker in the basement....... [heavy breathing] I'm going to go insane
- If I see another survivor crouch walk to someone on a hook from across the entire map......
- If you are going to rescue someone from a hook. Finish the rescue. Or they will just die instantly.
- When the game starts and you have full health. Get a generator....
- If you see a teammate that is hurt. Heal them.
- If you are the teammate that is hurt. Don't run from other survivors. They aren't trying to kill you. They are trying to help
- If you are a killer, please find the trapdoor so if everyone dies that last guy can't escape easily.

Everyone needs to quit the whining and acting like babies.
This is an amazing game and the Devs are doing there best to fix all problems and make every player happy and most importantly fair. .

Betadan beri oynamaktayım size olan bitenden bahsedeyim.Oyun 1 katil 4 hayatta kalandan oluşuyor.Ana ekranda seçiminizi yaptıktan sonra maceranıza başlıyorsunuz.Oyunda çeşitli perkler ve katillerde özellikler var doğru dizilimle gerçekten karşı taraf için zorlu bi oyun gerçekleştirebiliyorsunuz.

Survivor tarafında, jeneratör yapıp 2 ana kapıdan birinden veya haritada rastgele spawnlanan kapaktan kaçmaya çalışıyorsunuz.Bu sırada katil sizin veya ekip arkadaşlarınızın peşinizde olacaktır.Birbirinize yardım ederek kurtulmalısınız.

Killer tarafında,kaçmaya çalışanları öldürmeye çalışıyorsunuz.Bunu şu şekilde yapıyorsunuz;survivoru yere düşürdükten sonra haritada belirli hooklara asıyorsunuz 3. asışta öleceklerdir veya memento mori ve belirli perklerle bir defa astığınız kişileri olduğu yerde öldürebilisiniz.

İyi ve kötü yanları;

İyi yanları;
Perkleri çok çeşitli tutuyorlar hep yenisi ekleniyor
İki tarafında dengesi iyi
Piyasadaki en iyi gerilim kaçış oyunu

Kötü yanları;
Belirli ranka geldikten sonra kanser oluyorsunuz.
Oyunun belli taktikleri bir süreden sonra kendini tekrarlayabiliyor.
Yeni çıkan killerlar satmak icin çok güçlü oluyorlar
Kaç senedir killer matchmaking'i düzeltmediler bekliyorsunuz oyun bulmak için

---edited---

I've preordered this game and when I could install it and play, it felt like a regression to 2003. 
Graphics are too basic, most of the scenary is repeated (for example a scenario featuring a corn plantation, all corn plants look almost the same, this is a common resource: re-using items instead of designing variations. There is no option to turn down the music, there's only one volume setting... 

Points system is hard if you are a low level, items are expensive and you may need to play qute a few times in order to use/purchase any item. Beware because if you get caught during the game, those items you have been carrying get lost. If you get caught you wont live, even if you keep clicking your mouse button as instructed, when it reaches 99% wont allow you to get up and scape, so dont follow instructions. There is another annoying visual aspect to the game, there are 5 players, one being the hunter and the rest being "victims", and there are only 4 characters, so you will mostly play with clones of your character because the game doesnt avoid that.

Finishing my review I would like to state that since this morning multiplayer is down (comes and goes erraticly) its now saying that my steam app is offline, the same app I'm using to post this review. So for now, this game is unplayable.

The game is very basic, if a demo was available I wouldn't have bought this game.

This game is a very well-made multiplayer suvival horror game that has an interesting concept done right. Each map and killer is very balanced and make sure that the game is neither too hard or too easy. My only complaint for the game is how badly the flashlight needs to be buffed. I've tried so many time to blind the killer with it but it always ends with me on hook. Its practically garbage and makes me want to have anything but it.

This game reminds me of Evolve so much it's ridiculous. But instead of having the monster and hunters duke it out all over the map, 4 survivors have to run away from a brutal killer which brings me to my point. Some killers on this game love to camp on their incapacitated victims. I have request to make with the Devs right now. Can you guys make it so when you are freed off of a hook you have a couple seconds of immunity just so the killer can't spawn kill you, it's very angering to be lifted off the hook only to be put right back on and be killed by clubbage, thank you for your time.
The game is extremely fun to play, i love it.... but you cannot play with any friends unless you start a private game.... that means absolutely nothing.

ok now im sad. what happened to this game. the beta was great and had its flaws and we reported them but they didnt even get touched. had 4 hours in the beta but like 30 min on the full game. that shows something. hurt me because i was hyped up for this one. just more of a reason to stop pre-ordering games because this stuff happens. buy if you want but right now since they couldnt hear the community i cant recommend this the way it is. this is the beta with all of the content.
The perfect horror movie game!

[h1] Great Adrenalin pumping game (RECOMENDED"	[/h1]
-First off lets say this game really gets your heart pumping! Loads of fun and you really feel like you accomplish something!

-The only "negative" to this game is that you cannot que up with your friends in RANKED. This being said you can still play in private match which offers no EXP or progression. Now i can understand it would be WAY too easy if you were playing ranked with friends and had skype to say where the killer was at the time.

[h1] Immersion 	[/h1]

Now with that negative about no que with friends in ranked and no text or voice in game. This just really adds to the immersion in my opinion. You dont see any players name, no voice. All you see is your fellow random player who may risk it all to save you over his/her life. The music is terrifying in this game thus adding to the world. Knowing you are slower then the killer adds a whole new thinking to hiding over running. You must outsmart your killer. Sacrifices will be made for you...or by you. 

[h1] The Killer	[/h1]
Not as easy as you may think with some of the kilers. It is really fun to be honest. Learn the mistakes of your prey capture and sacrifice them while stopping them from starting generators/ escaping. You have a much less FOV as you are in first person giving the survivors a better chance at hiding from you.

[h1] Final Thoughts 	[/h1]
[h1] Pros   	[/h1]
-Great Immersion
-Great soundtrack
-Horrifying Screams
-Beautiful enviorment
-FUN!
-Get this game

[h1] Cons  	[/h1]
- No ranked with friends ( but with good reason as listed above)
- No way to progress in private match ( with friends) 
- Some may say no VOIP or text chat in game is bad, But i dont think so it really gets you in the game

For full review, please head to this discussion thread:

http://steamcommunity.com/app/381210/discussions/0/358415206078435146/

밸런스

살인마와 생존자 사이에 밸런스가 개판입니다.
생존자는 살인마를 피해 도망다니기가 정말 쉽게 되어있습니다.
스피드 차이도 그렇게 크지 않은데다가, 맵 곳곳에 장애물들이 있으니, 살인마를 농락하는것도 가능할 정도입니다.
하지만 살인마는 그런 생존자 하나잡기도 어려운데 4명을 잡아야해요.
그리고 베타 후반때부터 생존자들이 1명을 미끼로 쓰고 3명이서 몰려다니며 발전기를 다켜버리는데,
살인마가 어떻게 막을 방법이 없어요.
그냥 생존자들이 조금만 단합해도, 살인마는 왕따마냥 농락당하다 끝날것입니다.

그리고 살인마가 생존자를 타격했을때, 왜 갑자기 멈추는거죠?
밸런싱 문제라면 별말은 안하겠습니다만, 한대 쳤을때 피닦다가 놓친경우가 한두번이 아닙니다.
거기다 놓치면 치료킷으로 치료까지 하고 오더라구요.

그리고 제가 제일 어이가 없었던것은 생존자들의 아이템들 입니다.
그것은 베타플레이를 하던때 일어난 일입니다.
그때는 살인마가 트랩퍼밖에 없었기 때문에, 저는 살인마를 플레이하며 덫을 깔고 있었죠.
그런데 덫이 하나 둘씩 없어지는 겁니다.
어이가 없어서 덫을 깔고 그것을 숨어서 지켜보니, 생존자들이 공구상자로 덫을 몽땅 부수고 있었습니다.
아니 갈고리도 다쳐부수고 덫도 다쳐부수면 살인마는 어쩌라는 겁니까?

랭크 시스템

랭크시스템은 도대체 왜 도입한거죠?
보통 랭크시스템은 비슷한 실력대의 사람들과 매칭을 해주기 위해 도입하는것이 아닌가요?
그런데 왜 20랭크 살인마가 10랭크 혹은 그 이상의 사람들과 매칭이 잡히는거죠?
이해를 할수가 없군요.

거기다가 점수시스템도 개판이에요.
탈출하려던 4명중에 3명을 마지막즈음 한번에 잡았더니, 7000점을 받고 랭크가 하나 강등된 적도 있습니다.
게임의 본질이 살인마가 생존자를 잡아 죽이는것인데, 그럼 점수를 더 얻기위해 생존자를 방생했다 다시 잡아야합니까?

결론

이대로 가다가는 조만간 살인마 유저들이 대거 이탈할것으로 보입니다.
이렇게 만들거면 차라리 살인마를 AI로 하시지 그랬어요?
누가 게임하는데 빡치는걸 좋아하겠습니까? 다 접고 다른게임하러가지.

예를들어서 스타 유즈맵 약올리기 아십니까?
그것을 하면 항상 약올리는 사람은 많이 하려고 하는데, 술래를 하려고 하는 사람은 거의 없습니다.
그때문에 게임 자체를 못하는 경우가 많은데, 이게임도 조만간 그렇게 될까 무섭네요.

빠른 밸런스 패치가 시급합니다.

Is this game fun? Yes, it's fun. Plenty of "omg noise... he's coming! OMG OMG OMG OH SHIT!" moments when playing as survivor, and devious good fun using wounded survivors as bait when playing as the killer. My favorite thing to do is ring the wraith's bell as I chase down victims.

That said, this game is not without faults. Here is a list of what's wrong with the game so far. (Current as of June 16)

Lobby Hoppers: There is no way to join a public server with friends, so you'll go through about a dozen people lobby hopping before you find four that are actually ready to settle down and play a match.

Disconnecting Asshats: Earning rank is very difficult and you'll lose it unless you have a perfect match. There's a big problem of people disconnecting to protect their rank. If you're chasing someone down who has any sort of rank progression, there's a good to fair chance they'll disconnect the moment you stick them on a meathook.

Window Vaulters: The killer is a big dude who can't go through windows as fast as his victims, so some cheeseball players think it's a fair tactic to jump back and forth through a window while the killer tries to go around the wall before they can hop back over.

Trap Door Campers: Some victims have figured out that if they're the second to last survivor on the map, all they have to do is camp out by the trap door and wait for that other guy to get killed. As soon as they're the last one alive, the door opens and they escape. The only way to prevent this as the killer is to somehow remember where the trap door is and make sure it's clear before you put one of the last two victims on a hook.

Repetitiveness: Every match is the same thing, four victims try to start up a bunch of generators while a killer sacrifices them to some sort of sky cthulu. Different objectives and different means of killing would liven things up a bit.

All in all I enjoy this game and definitly think it was worth the cost. 

However, it did have some major errors at launch and it seems like the devlopers did not pay much attention to the community from Beta to Launch.

Dead by Daylight is easily the best multiplayer slasher out there.  The Devs have done an amazing job keeping the tension of your favourite slasher movies while still managing to balance the game between predator and prey quite well.

There is still a few teething problems but hopefully they'll get ironed out soon.  

Well worth the price.

Had just sacrificed three of the survivors, playing on the farm map. This last remaining survivor was one of those special kinds of people that repeatedly window hop, try to interrupt your sacrifices, always seem to get away, etc. 

Well not this time.

Caught him off guard by the tractor and landed a shot on him. He began to limp away to the cornfield in a desperate attempt to break line of sight. But I was ready for this special friend of mine, for the field was littered in traps. In not too long I heard the most rewarding SNAP of a beartrap and came over to find him knees down in an upgraded trap. Hoisted him up on my shoulder and brought him to the top of the tractor, not the hooks, the tractor. Why? I had something special planned. And that specialty was a Memento Mori with his name on it. Dropped him on the tractor and let him crawl around for a bit, basking in the glory of catching this slippery ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥. After some time, placed my boot on his back lined up the machete, and went to town on his neck.

Ever, So, Satisfying.

12/10 would question my moral compass again.

Game is quite buggy...match making doesn't seem to work properly, frequently disconnects you from Steam.

The gameplay itself is sort of fun, but pretty shallow.  There's a cheap thrill in being chased around by someone that you can't actually kill and can only really escape from, but winning as the survivors seems almost impossible against a semi competent killer.  It's a nifty concept for a game but there's just not enough too it and the progression system is overly convoluted.

El juego seguirá mejorando y jugarlo con amigos y con otras personas online es una buena forma de pasar el tiempo.
Ser el asesino es genial, y ser el superviviente es un tormento (pero divertido).
Le cambiaría la duración de las temporadas porque el rango que tienes se resetea cada mes; eso sí lo hace un frustrante para algunos. La atmósfera es muy buena y la música no se queda atrás.
La jugabilidad de primer persona del asesino es muy acertada, así como la de tercera persona de los supervivientes.
Denle una oportunidad al juego.
Getting jump-scared by survivors as the killer makes this game worth it
Better now.

Very fresh and original
3 killers to choose from
Customization
Pretty graphics
A game that relys on teamwork
A bang for your buck and is sure to keep you busy

CONS:
Needs advanced optimization settings
More game modes

FINAL:Dead by Daylight is in my opinion one of the most original games to come out in recent memory.If you like co-op games then this is for you especially if you also love the Slasher genre.

Abolutely amazing game. The shiver you get down your spine when the killers get close and the skill check pops up is addictive. Although being the killer and bringing on a merciless onslaught of death is just as addictive. Dead by daylight really brings out your fear as a survivor and dark side as a killer.

I think it's safe to say I can leave a pretty good review with my hours. So, you'll probably see my time and say, "wOW yOu LEfT a neGaTIve reVIEw WitH ThAt maNY hOUrS?!" So original of you. Yes, it's a negative review because the community is the worst community of people I've ever met in a video game. These are some of thee worst a$$holes I've met both in skill and behavior(no pun intended). People usually complain about the devs, but the game is great. Can it get repetitive? Sure! The core of the game is amazing and pretty exhilarating. I don't think I've played another game that has the thrill this game supplies. 

ANYWAY, back to the problem. The people! People will go so far out of their way to screw you over for nothing, for not crouching back at them, because of your skin, because the item you brought, because you're a streamer, etc. I don't even mean this from one side to the other I'm talking as a survivor your own teammates will intentionally sabotage you for any reason. And it's not an every match occurrence, but it happens enough to make me want to do the same stuff back. You'll meet cool, kind people though and they are a moment of respite in an otherwise awful environment. Never mind playing killer where you play nice and don't do anything generally "wrong" and if you win the survivors get upset and if you lose they try to harass you in chat or on your profile. I'm not even talking about if you "camp" or "tunnel" people. That sends them into a seething, frothing rage.

Either way, if you feel like you can handle the shittery of Dead by Daylight I say buy it. If you're not really used to abuse I'd look elsewhere.

Dead by Daylight, also known as "Murdered by Morning," "Slaughtered by Sunrise," "Annihilated by AM," "Culled by Cockedoodle," and "I'm Having Too Much Fun With This: The Game," is an asymmetrical player versus player murder simulator in which one player controls a friendly masked killer and four other players control superhuman mutes with the ability to sprint at supersonic speeds. Activate five generators to power the exit gates of a magical murder-realm and skedaddle your way out to safety, but beware, for the killer is angry.

Just angry.

If you're looking to play with friends (even though the game was NEVER designed and is absolutely not balanced for people able to communicate over an outside VOIP client) and gleefully repair generators to the merry tune of people screaming on meathooks, this game is for you, a highly lethal and entertaining game of hide and seek.

If you want to BE the masked psycho killer, do NOT buy this game. The community hates you. The devs hate you. The balance of power is hideously skewed in the survivors' favor and it's NEVER going to change. You won't have very much fun after you rack up a level or two, and the matchmaking system makes doing anything with your lower-level killers nigh impossible, as you'll be constantly matched against better skilled, better coordinated players with a full set of overpowered standard perks. Any attempt at securing a kill will get you screamed at. Even if you're new, expect to be teabagged, infinitely looped and mocked in the after game chat.

If you want to play as a survivor, this is the game for you. If you want to play as a survivor with your friends, you're cancer, but this is still the game for you. If you want to play as a killer, buckle up, buttercup, you're in for a wild ride of disappointment and frustration.

So, I don't normally make comments about games, but I thought this game looked so amazing so I bought it for my girlfriend and I so we could play. However, you cannot play with your friends unless you make a private lobby and if it's a private lobby then you can't have random people join. In order to really get fun out of this game, you need to know 4 other people with the game or play with completely random people. I REALLY hope the makers change this soon, because the game does look pretty cool but I haven't really touched on the gameplay too much because I was too disappointed about not being able to play with a full lobby and play with my girlfriend. I am not recommending this game until it is changed.

Go fixer ce jeu de merde qui plante toutes les 5 mins.

C'est pas mauvais mais c'est pas convaincant non plus. Régler vos jeux avant de les sortir parce que je commence à en avoir ma claque d'acheter des jeux tous pourri fini avec le bout du zeub.

Ce jeu pue les MAJ intempestives, je me suis dit ça sent pas bon quand j'ai vu le gros 1.0 sur la page de démarrage. On se retrouve à la 100 ièmes update pour avoir un jeu correct, genre Payday 2 quoi! Espérons juste qu'ils nous gavent pas de DLCs tous nazes, mais ça aussi ça sent le caca.

Also ich muss sagen das sogar ich schon ein Review sogar nach nur 3 Stunden schon schreiben kann.
Es macht echt Tierisch Spaß und vor allem erst mit Freunde. Es gibt quasi ein Monster und vier Freunde die Überleben wollen. Kurz so am Rande, es gibt 3 verschieden Monster zur Auswahl die ich euch aber hier nicht verraten möchte bzw. sagen möchte was Sie so alles drauf haben. Jeder hat aber seine eigenen Eigenschaften.
Ziel ist es als Überlebender 5 oder 6 so kleine Betriebsmaschinen zu Reparieren, um wieder Strom zu erzeugen. Doch Achtung, beim Reparieren muss man wirklich vorsichtig sein, denn es gibt momente wo ein Kreis kommt und ein kleiner Bereich dargestellt wird in den man anhalten muss. Scheitert man daran, so macht die Maschine ein lautes Geräusch und erstrahlt im Lichte. Das Monster wird somit "Informiert" das dort herum hantiert wird.
Doch wenn man es einmal geschafft hat erhellt die Maschine und man sollte aber dennoch schleunigst verschwinden wegen des Lichts. ^^
Hat man alle aktiviert, so gibt es nun zwei Ausgänge durch die Ihr gehen könnt um zu Fliehen!
Man muss aber vorher noch einen Hebel ziehen das ca. 20-25 sekunden dauert und sogar da euch das Leben kosten könnte. Doch man sollte schon viele Risiken eingehen um zu Überleben. ;)
Grafisch gesehen ist es auch soweit ganz gut. Ist jetzt keine Battlefield 4 Grafik oder was weiß ich, aber Grafik ist ja auch nicht alles so wie ich immer sage. :)
Mehr möchte ich auch soweit nicht verraten.

Es macht jedenfalls mega Spaß und soooo Gruselig ist es iwie nicht. ^^
Das Spiel erinnert mich Stark an Freitag der 13th oder Jason.
Ich kann es jedenfalls nur jeden Empfehlen!

Wertung: 5 / 5

Great Game. Needs some work though.
